It's always been my understanding that during the Bakumatsu, people in Kyot=
o were 
generally pro-Choshu. I've recently gotten into an argument with so=
mebody who insisted 
that it wasn't the case.  In order to settle it, I ask=
ed Shikisoku for some citations (since my 
bookshelf collapsed the other da=
y and all my history books are in boxes 
now.)Unfortunately, that someone s=
aid Rekishi Dokuhon wasn't good enough to be used

ion website sources.) Could someone here help me and provide

s?  I'd really appreciate it.
